name: MALFUNCTION (itch) (Reece L Jones)
description:
MALFUNCTION is a fast-paced manic experience with an ever-firing blaster that changes fire rate, as well as rotating stages and the only movement being that of the blaster's recoil. 

Equipped with a faulty blaster you'll need to control the direction of the shots with your cursor, not only do you need to take care of your movement but also the ricocheting blasts.

With 11 stages to play through, and though you may learn a stage's layout you won't always be prepared for the malfunctions in fire rates and the sudden spin of a stage.

This game was made in 48 hours for the 2020 GMTK Jam with the theme: "Out of Control".

Follow: Twitter, Itch
